document.full_text: rescue teams using tiny cameras snaked through newly drilled bore holes in a collapsed silver mine have detected a void in fallen rock and debris near where they believe a miner has been trapped since last friday.
document.title: bore-hole cameras find void near trapped idaho miner
lines_and_colors: rescue teams using tiny cameras snaked through newly drilled bore holes in a collapsed silver mine have detected a void in fallen rock and debris near where they believe a miner has been trapped since last friday.
